message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $1400000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're looking to negotiate a better price, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1350000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product can bring to your business.
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go much lower. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to stay within my target. I'm counteroffering at $1300000. This is my final offer, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.

I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your last offer and my previous offer. I'll pay $1275000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm impressed by your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another small concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm counteroffering at $1295000. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $1280000, but no higher. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. However, I still need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to stay close to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1290000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to meet you at $1285000, but no higher. Can you consider this offer?
